name: HTTP API Controller Pattern
desc: Pattern for creating ABP HTTP API controllers

rules.delegation: Delegates to AppService, contains minimal logic
rules.logging: Use IVportalLogger for HTTP method logging

methods.pattern: [HttpGet("{ActionName}")] public async Task<{ReturnType}> {MethodName}Async({Parameters}) { _logger.LogHttpMethodStart(); try { var response = await _{entityName}AppService.{MethodName}Async({parameters}); _logger.LogHttpMethodFinish(); return response; } finally { _logger.LogHttpMethodFinish(); } }
